title: Man Supervillain Medium Dark Skin Tone
alsoKnownAs: Medium Dark Skin Tone Supervillain Man
description: A man with a medium-dark skin tone dressed as a supervillain, often depicted with a cape and mask, symbolizing evil, power, or a formidable antagonist.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the man supervillain emoji, presented with a medium-dark skin tone, possesses an aura of menacing power and intrigue, captured through Apple‚Äôs dramatic lighting and shading. His cape flows with a rich, dark texture, and his masked face, with piercing eyes, is rendered with sharp 3D detail, conveying a sense of hidden intent. This emoji on Apple devices is often used playfully to represent a challenging situation, a mischievous plan, or a formidable opponent in a lighthearted context.
